column5: going to lower buckhorn lake tomorrow for the day and need some help. i have never fished lower buckhorn before i have only fished upper and its an amazing lake for musky. i was just wondering if anyone had any ideas of what lures i should be using tomorrow for this lake at this time of year? any answers would be appriciated thanks!
Lots of good structure at the top of Deer Bay, troll the channel markers, 10" Jakes, 10" Believers...There should be good weeds in Black Duck Bay, cast bucktails, etc.
